snippet.title: Follia - Dear Father - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Follia – Dear Father is a stealth survival horror that captures the genre’s essence in the halls and rooms of a university campus. Marcus goes in search of his parents, but instead finds himself struggling for his life against deadly horrors that creep around every corner.

Add the game to your wishlist on Steam so you don’t miss any of its ongoing development updates or the announcement of the release date!
http://bit.ly/folliadearfather
